aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.general: Hi, I'm Steffi! I see programming as a way to combine creative ideas with logical thinking. I especially enjoy tackling problems and building something new through code. IT fascinates me because there’s always something new to learn, and every step forward opens up exciting possibilities.
aboutMe.located: I live in Essen and primarily work remotely, though I’m also open to hybrid arrangements.
aboutMe.cognition: Being open-minded and eager to learn is essential for me as a developer. I enjoy exploring new technologies, expanding my knowledge, and continuously growing – both professionally and personally.
aboutMe.quality: I approach challenges in a structured yet creative way. Every task is an opportunity to find better solutions. Writing clean, readable code that can be easily maintained and extended within a team is very important to me.

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.general: I bring experience in modern web development and enjoy creating clean, structured code. Since the field evolves so quickly, I’m always eager to learn new technologies and improve my skills. Every new development is a chance to grow and put my knowledge into practice.
skills.question: Missing a
skills.prompt: Feel free to get in touch – I look forward to expanding my knowledge and exploring new technologies.

portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.general: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

Join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks via drag-and-drop, assign users and categories.

Happy Hollow.description: Jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Choose a Tiny Hero, collect magical berries, and defeat the mighty Endboss.

Portfolio.description: My personal developer portfolio built with Angular 20 – a platform to showcase my projects, skills, and passion for coding.

references.title: What my colleagues say about me

1.text: Lukas has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.

2.text: I had the good fortune of working with Lukas in a group project at the Developer Akademie that involved a lot of effort. He always stayed calm, cool, and focused, and made sure our team was set up for success. He is super knowledgeable, easy to work with, and I'd happily work with him again given the chance.

3.text: Our project benefited enormously from Simon's efficient way of working.

4.text: Lukas has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.

contactMe.title: Let's work together
contactMe.general:
I help you create effective solutions and deliver real value. 
As a frontend developer, I bring your ideas to life with clean code and modern design.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.text3: By accessing and using Portfolio (Product), you acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions, and any policies, guidelines, or amendments thereto that may be presented to you from time to time. We, the listed students, may update or change the terms and conditions from time to time without notice.
legalNotice.h6.4: Scope and ownership of the product
legalNotice.text4: Portfolio has been developed as part of a student group project in a web development bootcamp at the Developer Akademie GmbH. It has an educational purpose and is not intended for extensive personal & business usage. As such, we cannot guarantee consistent availability, reliability, accuracy, or any other aspect of quality regarding this Product. The design of Portfolio is owned by the Developer Akademie GmbH. Unauthorized use, reproduction, modification, distribution, or replication of the design is strictly prohibited.
legalNotice.text5: Aside from the design owned by Developer Akademie GmbH, we, the listed students, retain all proprietary rights in Portfolio, including any associated copyrighted material, trademarks, and other proprietary information.
legalNotice.text6: Portfolio is intended to be used for lawful purposes only, in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any use of Portfolio for illegal activities, or to harass, harm, threaten, or intimidate another person, is strictly prohibited. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users of Portfolio.
legalNotice.h6.7: Disclaimer of warranties and limitation of liability
legalNotice.text7: Portfolio is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind, whether express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. In no event will we, the listed students, or the Developer Akademie, be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages, arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of Portfolio.
legalNotice.text8: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless us, the listed students, the Developer Akademie, and our affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, and employees, from and against any claim, demand, loss, damage, cost, or liability (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or relating to your use of Portfolio and/or your breach of this Legal Notice.
